get.description: Lists all of the available Automation REST API operations.

parameters.description: Client Api Version.
parameters.name: api-version

schema.description: The response model for the list of Automation operations

value.description: List of Automation operations supported by the Automation resource provider.

operation.description: Operation type: Read, write, delete, etc.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed: Runbooks, Jobs etc.

name.description: Operation name: {provider}/{resource}/{operation}

default.description: Automation error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response of an operation failure

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

get.description: Retrieve a list of accounts within a given subscription.

parameters.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: Client Api Version.
parameters.name: api-version

schema.description: The response model for the list account operation.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link.

value.description: Gets or sets list of accounts.

allOf.description: The core properties of ARM resources

id.description: Fully qualified resource Id for the resource

name.description: The name of the resource

allOf.description: The resource model definition for a ARM tracked top level resource

location.description: The Azure Region where the resource lives

items.description: Definition of the automation account type.

etag.description: Gets or sets the etag of the resource.

properties.description: Gets or sets the automation account properties.

lastModifiedBy.description: Gets or sets the last modified by.

sku.description: Gets or sets the SKU of account.

capacity.description: Gets or sets the SKU capacity.

family.description: Gets or sets the SKU family.

name.description: Gets or sets the SKU name of the account.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

schema.description: Error response of an operation failure

message.description: Error message indicating why the operation failed.

get.description: Retrieve the usage for the account id.

parameters.description: Name of an Azure Resource group.
parameters.name: resourceGroupName

parameters.description: The name of the automation account.

parameters.name: subscriptionId

parameters.description: Client Api Version.
parameters.name: api-version

schema.description: The response model for the get usage operation.

currentValue.description: Gets or sets the current usage value.

id.description: Gets or sets the id of the resource.

limit.description: Gets or sets max limit. -1 for unlimited

name.description: Gets or sets the usage counter name.

localizedValue.description: Gets or sets the localized usage counter name.

value.description: Gets or sets the usage counter name.

throttleStatus.description: Gets or sets the throttle status.

unit.description: Gets or sets the usage unit name.
